DOC.brief_summary: To assess relationship ovarian endometrioma lower urinary tract symptom , sexual function gastrointestinal symptom . In addition , investigator also assess impact surgery ovarian endometrioma lower urinary tract symptom , sexual function gastrointestinal symptom .

DOC.detailed_description: All patient find ovarian endometrioma invite participate study . The size location ovarian endometrioma assess ultrasonography . Besides , enrol female patient ask complete overactive bladder symptom score , female bladder function , female sexual function , bowel incontinence assessment questionnaires CA125 level . In addition , patient underwent surgery ovarian endometrioma request complete questionnaire CA125 check-up 3 & 6 month surgery . At least 30 woman age body mass index match without ovarian endometrioma invite participate study control group .
DOC.criteria: 1 . > 20 year old . 2 . Ovarian endometrioma : woman frost glass content ovarian cyst 1 . The patient acute low urinary tract infection intestinal inflammation . 2 . Had receive surgery bladder urethra . 3 . Patients history urinary tract stone tumor .
